Reviews.Title: Great buy!  Pleased with purchase!
Reviews.Author: Kevin F.
Reviews.Content: The phone resembles the Apple 5 - is slightly longer - but uses android operating system.  No itunes needed.  Easy to download and install apps.  Very user friendly.  Extremely happy with purchase.  Item filled by Amazon warehouse - quick delivery!

Reviews.Title: Very good,
Reviews.Author: Yuan Chen
Reviews.Content: Very good, and also very nice seller.I hope more people see this, and enjoy it. If you don't know where to go before then read this and buy it here.
